BatchEventHeaders.description: The header information of the Batch event.

eventId.description: The unique id for identifying the event.

eventCorrelationId.description: The request id received by NCMP as an acknowledgement.

eventTime.description: The time of the event. It should be in RFC format ('yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ').

eventTarget.description: The destination topic to forward the consumed event.

eventType.description: The type of the Batch event.

eventSchema.description: The schema of the Batch event payload.

eventSchemaVersion.description: The schema version of the Batch event payload.
